mapper.update: update TB_MEMBER_INFO set nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, pwd_hint_code = #{pwdHintCode}, pwd_ans = #{pwdAns}, address = #{address}, email = #{email} where member_id = #{memberId}
update TB_MEMBER_INFO set child_number = +1 where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from TB_MEMBER_INFO where member_id = #{memberId} and pwd_hint_code = #{pwdHintCode} and pwd_ans = #{pwdAns}

select C.advis_id, C.advis_name, C.advis_img, A.member_id, A.appoint_no, A.coin, A.start_day, A.end_day, A.pay_price, A.payinfo from TB_adviser C join TB_appointment A on C.advis_id = A.advis_id where member_id = #{memberId}

select C.cmember_id, A.advis_name, A.advis_day, A.advis_price, A.advis_img, B.appoint_no, B.member_id, B.coin, B.start_day, B.end_day from TB_adviser A join TB_comp_member C on A.advis_id = C.cmember_id join TB_appointment B on A.advis_id = B.advis_id where C.cmember_id = #{cmemberId} and B.coin >0
